Package br.com.concepting.framework.controller.form.util

Class ActionFormUtil

java.lang.Object
br.com.concepting.framework.controller.form.util.ActionFormUtil
public class ActionFormUtil extends Object
Class responsible to manipulate forms and its actions.

    • getModelClassByActionForm

      public static <M extends BaseModel, F extends BaseActionForm<M>> Class<M> getModelClassByActionForm(Class<F> actionFormClass) throws ClassNotFoundException
      Returns the data model class based on the form class.
      Type Parameters:
      M - Class that defines the data model.
      F - Class that defines the form.
      Parameters:
      actionFormClass - Class that defines the form.
      Returns:
      Class that defines the data model.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - Occurs when was not possible to execute the operation.
